start.description: So you wanna fight the state with your friends? Better be able to talk to them without the state listening in. We like to fight the state with Signal - it makes it really hard for anyone to read what you're writing to other folks, especially if they also have Signal. You can send text messages, make calls, and even chat on a laptop on Signal, all without the state listening in (probably).

nextSteps.prompt: Cool! I want to install Signal.

androidInstall.description: To install Signal on an Android phone, visit the Play Store and download the app. If that's hard to do, you can search for Signal on Google Play.

iosInstall.description: To install Signal on an iOS device, visit https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/signal-private-messenger/id874139669?mt=8 and download the app.

chromeInstall.description: To install Signal for desktop, visit https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/signal-private-messenger/bikioccmkafdpakkkcpdbppfkghcmihk?hl=en .

yay.description: Nice job! Now you can communicate without eavesdroppers. You could work on something else now, or you could get your friends to install Signal too - so you can have secret-er conversations!

nextSteps.prompt: I want to do something else now!
I want to install Signal on another device.
I want to get my friends to use signal!
